Package ICS4UProject

Interface CameraView

All Known Implementing Classes:
BodyImage, BodyRec, Camera, CollisionBodyImage, CollisionBodyRec, CollisionImage, CollisionRec, Enemy, EnemyShell, GameObject, GameObjectImage, GameObjectRec, InteractiveObjectImage, InteractiveObjectRec, Lavaball, MovingPlatformImage, Mushroom, Platform, PlatformImage, PlatformImagePattern, Player
public interface CameraView
This interface enables object to be moved by the camera
